channel.title: LLM on Cortically Magnified
channel.description: Recent content in LLM on Cortically Magnified

item.description: Pierre Menard, Author of the Quixote 1 Pierre Menard, Author of the Quixote is my favorite story by Jorge Luis Borges. Every time I read it I find something new to think about. The premise of this story is sheer absurdity: the narrator claims that his writer friend Pierre Menard had accomplished an unparalleled feat in literature, but this magnum opus was invisible to most people, because it was identical to selected chapters of Don Quixote by Cervantes.
